channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-28795] Unstable test for HiveDialectQueryITCase#testInsertDirectory
item.description:
The HiveDialectQueryITCase#testInsertDirectory is unstable. The failure link https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=39233&view=logs&j=fc5181b0-e452-5c8f-68de-1097947f6483&t=995c650b-6573-581c-9ce6-7ad4cc038461

we need to wait the insert to finish before select from the table

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=39941&view=logs&j=fc5181b0-e452-5c8f-68de-1097947f6483&t=995c650b-6573-581c-9ce6-7ad4cc038461
